banner.contact: If you are interested in working with me, please send me an email or contact me in any other way convenient for you

home.title: Greetings!

hero.subtitle: general information
hero.description: If you are looking for a hard-working, conscientious and ready for new challenges employee - then I am the person you need. I advanced twice in the courses, because I devoted all my time to studying - I was a scrum master and a team leader on team projects. Even before the completion of the courses, she already participated in commercial projects (one of them social, the other - a start-up), after completion - in another commercial one from the company (you can see all the works on the projects page)

features.title: features
features.subtitle: each component is interactive, so when you click or hover over it, the element will expand - try and see for yourself

first.title: Responsive Design
first.subtitle: See projects on different devices
first.text: Explore a diverse collection of my creative endeavors, including web design, JavaScript / TypeScript and mini projects. Each project showcases my creativity, attention to detail, and passion for delivering visually stunning and engaging experiences

second.title: Code Quality
second.subtitle: Explore the code in the repository
second.text: Behind the scenes, I pride myself on writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code. Learn more about my coding standards and practices that contribute to the functionality and performance of the projects I undertake

third.title: Creative Projects
third.subtitle: Evaluate the original approach
third.text: Dive into my problem-solving skills and logical thinking. Explore how I approach challenges, find innovative solutions, and adapt to emerging technologies. Discover my commitment to continuous learning and improvement, ensuring every project meets high-quality standards and exceeds expectations

3d.title: Below are the «workhorses»
3d.subtitle: pay attention to this prompt so that it is clear what and how to do
3d.commentToSubtitle: when mouse hovering over this text block, other hints will appear (on a device without a mouse, you need to click on this text)
3d.prompt: * in the block where the cursor with the hand appears, in order to scroll the page, use the scrollbar on the right edge (normal mouse actions will bring objects closer or further away)
3d.comment: ** below are 3D objects, they are interactive - you can rotate them, enlarge, reduce, view them from all sides and do whatever you want ;)
3d.inFuture: 2. second - I want to use in the future
3d.summary: *** I hope that you enjoyed this interactive part
3d.heading: My devices

home.subtitle: this is last but not least section of home page thats why I sure that you will like it ^_^

about.title: Prysiazhnaia Anastasiia
about.description: I am a full-stack web developer with a passion for building beautiful and functional websites

first.title: Responsibility
first.description: I was the head of a children's dance studio, founded my own stretching studio, and worked on team projects as a Scrum Master and team lead. I believe this is enough to define my level of organization, proactivity, and responsibility.

second.title: Hard Work
second.description: I do everything to the fullest extent and take the initiative to do even more. I always conscientiously perform tasks assigned to me.

third.title: Perseverance
third.description: When faced with difficulties, I don't give up. On the contrary, challenges push me to develop even further.

forth.title: Punctuality
forth.description: I always plan my time and often arrive early for meetings, events, and other commitments. I value both my own time and that of others.

fifth.title: Communication Skills
fifth.description: Considering my previous experience of working with a large number of people of different age groups, I have developed strong communication skills, conflict resolution abilities, and the ability to handle various situations.

sixth.title: Stress Resistance
sixth.description: Since there is a lot of stress in our lives, I have learned to stay focused and work effectively in stressful situations.

seventh.title: Kindness
seventh.description: I am a positive person who always seeks the best in every person and situation.

about.confirm: To confirm my studies in the courses and their successful completion, I am attaching a certificate and screens of the progress of my studies from my personal course cabinet

title.second: Screens of my personal course cabinet

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: Below are the various technologies, frameworks and libraries I own. For convenience, they are grouped and implemented using the Accordion component. Each card inside is interactive - interesting interaction!)
skills.slider: This is how I work and what the workflow looks like from the outside - at least I want it to be like that ;)
